meta.title: Geo Data Merger
meta.description: A data merger for json, csv, geojson and topojson files.

sections.title: Choose your files
sections.subtitle:
We can handle json, csv, geojson and topojson files.
We don't upload your data. Everything stays in your browser.

sections.title: Select keys to merge by
sections.subtitle: Choose the keys to merge the data by.

sections.title: Save
sections.subtitle: Choose which keys should be included in your final result.

social.twitter: Geo Data Merger - A tool for merging data sets by @funkeinteraktiv
